directions: In a large bowl, combine the rice, salad dressing, mayonnaise, green onion, curry powder, dry mustard, salt and pepper. Mix well and refrigerate until chilled.
To the rice mixture, add the ham, cauliflower, peas, celery and radishes. Mix well and serve with sliced avocado or shredded  lettuce.
ingredients: 3 cups cooked long grain white rice
1 1/2 cups cooked ham, cut into thin strips
title: Rice and Ham Salad
